executive_summary: The Digital Advertising Agencies industry in the US has been driven by the shift from traditional print advertising to digital advertisements. In particular, strong demand for digital advertising from the retail, financial services, automotive and telecommunication sectors has sustained industry revenue.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Tools that measure the effects of online advertising campaigns have proliferated
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Digital advertising agencies have offered various pricing models to attract and retain clients.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Many businesses have demanded impression-based advertising due to its tangible results
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: As more innovative tools have been developed to measure the effectiveness of advertisements in influencing consumer behavior.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Digital Advertising Agencies Have Increasingly Provided Cross-Device Advertisements
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: More businesses are investing in digital advertising to broaden their reach across formats.

current_performance.current_performance_point_title: Popular Video-Sharing Websites Are Taking Advantage Of Advertising
current_performance.current_performance_point_description: Advertisements can be placed on videos to show before, during or after a user streams a video.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: RETAILERS WILL SPEND MORE ADVERTISING DOLLARS ONLINE
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: By 2024, e-commerce sales will account for 17.0% of all US retail sales.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: CROSS-INTERFACE MEDIA IS BRINGING IN MORE REVENUE
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Many businesses will purchase streamlined digital advertising services that display on different screens and platforms.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Video Advertising Will Continue to Provide a Solid Revenue Stream
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Advertisers will use their ads to connect consumers with their company's social media profiles.

future_outlook.future_outlook_point_title: Lawsuits From Smaller Companies and Governments Will Decide the Future of Digital Ads
future_outlook.future_outlook_point_description: Advertising companies will seek out ways to hold a user's gaze.

industry_definition: Businesses in this industry create advertising campaigns and place the advertisements across digital media outlets.
key_trends: The most prevalent barrier for new entrants is the brand awareness of key advertisers.
The industry is highly fragmented, comprising a large number of small-scale agencies.
More businesses now rely on digital advertising services to strengthen their online presence.
The digital advertising industry constantly evolves with new technologies and shifting consumer behavior.

market_segmentation.segment_description: Retail's most significant revenue share can be partly attributed to the number of consumers making their retail purchasing decisions online.
Telecommunication-related advertising has steadily declined due to data privacy laws.
Consumers have turned to the internet to shop for their next vehicle.
The financial sector's demand for digital advertising services has remained relatively stagnant.

market_segmentation.segment: Consumer packaged goods and consumer products sector
market_segmentation.segment_description: Demand for digital advertising services has increased in line with peak seasons.
The travel sector will increasingly demand digital advertising services.
Other Sectors Will Account for a Larger Share of Industry Revenue.

tier_1_suppliers: Audio Production Studios in the US
tier_2_suppliers: Internet Publishing and Broadcasting in the US
tier_2_buyers: Finance and Insurance in the US
Accommodation and Food Services in the US

demand_determinants.determinant_title: As internet traffic increases due to more consumers accessing websites from their mobile devices, tablets or computers, demand for digital advertising services will rise.

barriers_points.barrier_description: The most prevalent barrier for new entrants is the brand awareness of key advertisers.

concentration_points.concentration_description: The industry exhibits a medium level of market share concentration.
Prominent companies have gained influence through mergers and acquisitions.

cost_factors.cost_factor_title: Digital Advertisers Purchase Media Time, Advertising Space and Computer Equipment for Developing Marketing Materials
cost_factors.cost_factor_description: Smaller agencies that do not have in-house market research services incur costs related to securing market research.

volatility_points.volatility_title: THE DIGITAL ADVERTISING AGENCIES INDUSTRY HAS A MODERATE-TO-HIGH LEVEL OF REVENUE VOLATILITY
volatility_points.volatility_description: As internet traffic volumes have skyrocketed, the industry has grown with strong revenue streams.

volatility_points.volatility_title: The Industry Exhibits Some Volatility Due to Experiencing Seasonal Demand
volatility_points.volatility_description: Industry revenue fluctuates moderately as general advertising expenditures are linked to economic conditions.

technological_change_points.technological_change_title: RESULTS-DRIVEN TOOLS ARE THE NEW NORM
technological_change_points.technological_change_description: Pay-for-performance is a process in which digital advertising agencies receive a fixed commission.

technological_change_points.technological_change_title: VIDEO SHARING AND SOCIAL MEDIA DIGITAL ADS HAVE GROWN OVER THE PAST FIVE YEARS
technological_change_points.technological_change_description: The dominance of video streaming platforms has contributed to higher demand for digital ads.

FAQs.question: How have recent economic conditions influenced consumer demand for your company's services?
FAQs.answer: As consumer and investor confidence are high, demand for industry services are also high.

FAQs.question: Does your company offer a broad range of services or does it specialize in a singular, niche service?
FAQs.answer: While some companies specialize in digital advertising, larger companies may simply have a division dedicated to industry activity.

FAQs.question: Has your company perused merger and acquisition strategies as a means of gaining market share and improving efficiencies?
FAQs.answer: Large companies in this industry are highly active in merging or acquiring other companies.

FAQs.question: What is your company's most significant operational expense?
FAQs.answer: The most significant operation expense for the industry is wages.

FAQs.question: Has increased levels of technological innovation/development presented any obstacles for your company?
FAQs.answer: It is vital for industry companies to be aware of any changes to technological preferences.

FAQs.question: Have you minimized/reduced wage costs by automating your company's operations?
FAQs.answer: Given the nature of the industry, it is difficult for employees to be fully replaced with automation.

FAQs.question: Over the past five years, has the regulatory environment experienced significant change, or has it remained relatively stable?
FAQs.answer: Although federal and state chambers have enacted legislation aimed at protecting consumers.

FAQs.question: What are some of the most pervasive regulatory requirements that your company experiences?
FAQs.answer: While there is not a significant amount of formal legal regulation in advertising.

FAQs.question: Does your company struggle to finance its ongoing operations?
FAQs.answer: Generally, companies in this industry do not undergo significant capital projects.

FAQs.question: How does your company's profit margin compare with those of your main competitors?
FAQs.answer: Profit margins in the industry are relatively low.

FAQs.question: How quickly can new technology be adopted? Does your company keep up to date with the latest technology? What are the associated costs?
FAQs.answer: Digital agencies must stay up-to-date with the latest developments in technology.

FAQs.question: Do you have a strong reputation among customers? Are you known for your reliability and performance?
FAQs.answer: Digital advertisers that develop a solid brand with a good reputation achieve a greater level of success.

FAQs.question: How do you make sure your prices are attractive to customers? How can you get involved in the AAAA?
FAQs.answer: Membership in the American Association of Advertising Agencies may indicate higher professionalism.

FAQs.question: Do you monitor levels of corporate profit? What added value do you provide corporate clients that print advertising does not?
FAQs.answer: As businesses become more profitable, they often expand their advertising budgets.

FAQs.question: In what ways will your business benefit from the expected increase in consumer spending?
FAQs.answer: A rise in consumer spending indicates that more consumers are making discretionary purchases.

FAQs.question: Do you track changes in internet traffic volume? How can you cater to an older online demographic? A younger demographic?
FAQs.answer: Internet traffic volumes represent the total data sent over the internet globally per month.
